replies.body: Please Riot, make URF available to everyone, but not as a constant gamemode, as it could become boring and unplayed, less exciting etc. but more like Twisted Treeline; available once every so often. Thanks :) Would be great. Up vote if you agree.
I agree, that would be sweet

please bring back URF

Clueless girl was clueless. Teemo's kit is nigh useless in URF. In a gamemode in which burst damage wins, Teemo relies on damage over time and blinding the enemy (Did we mention blinding doesn't stop you from using skills and skills have 80% CDR? Hm..). Having a Teemo is essentially inhibiting one slot from a potential Jax, Katarina, Jayce, Evelynn, Ezreal, or just about anyone else with decent burst potential, and replacing it with a champion who will a) AFK after setting a bunch of mushrooms and hoping the enemy will step through them enough to die, or b) Actually be a part of teamfights, but realize he's naught more than .5 seconds worth of cannon fodder. Yeah no, tell me more about Teemo's potential. I'm so fascinated.

URF has turned many people into "play-makers" I'd say continuing URF as a custom game mode will be great. It's been so much fun, and it should remain, however not benefit from XP or IP so therefor it's a game-mode friends can jump into for a thrill. URF is the {{item:1027}} of the customs!
